title: Is Cardi B mentally challenged in some way? Does she have some kind of mental illness? - Quora
tags: Female Rappers and Hip Hop Artists

response.answer_text: She doesn’t have to be mentally challenged to be a standard deviation below the mean in terms of human intelligence, which, I think, is more what you’re wondering? Idk, maybe I’m wrong. Nevertheless, she’s clearly not the sharpest tool in the shed. For example, she posts some really disturbing things on IG sometimes, which isn’t necessarily bad, but she does it in a way such that you can tell she thinks she’s being artistic and profound, but she’s just not, and she just doesn’t get it. Cardi B demonstrates regularly that she’s a bit lacking in self-awareness. Mental disability or not, she’s noticeably unintelligent.

It isn’t uncommon for celebrities to have mental illnesses, given that they are celebrities, therefore I would not doubt the fact that she does. These mental illnesses can include depression, anxiety etc.. Now if you meant to mental disabilities like autism, OCD etc., then that’s another story. I am aware that depression and anxiety are both disabilities as well but they are harder to spot. In conclusion the only way to really know is to ask them personally but that can be rude, so ideally they should be the one to tell you if they have a diagnosed illness or disability.
